title: $1,723 / 1br -$1000 Beautiful Modern Renovated Unit + Parking Incld!
posting_body: 1 Month Free and a $1,000 Look and Lease Promotion COMPLETELY renovated Parking!
See 3D Tour (of similar like-kind unit with same specs) here: <URL>
Every corner of this wonderful apartment has been remodeled.
Featuring beautifully stained hardwood style flooring, GE Stainless Steel kitchen appliances, including a glass-top stove, and quartz countertops!
The bedroom is spacious and bright.
The apartment offers many windows that allow light to pleasingly flood into the unit.
The bathroom was also fully renovated.
(1) parking space is included in the rent.
“Look and Lease” Promotion: $1,000.00 credit if you sign your lease within 48
Rent Due After ”Look and Lease” Promotion: $1,950.00
*Advertised Price is based off “Look and Lease” Promotion on a 13-month lease*
Option 1: get $1,000 off the 2nd month rent and pay only $1,950.00
Option 2: Amortizing the $1,000 look & lease Concession ( a $1,000 value) over the 13 months for an equal credit of $226.92 each month for the 13 months, or $1,723.08/ month
The Harder-Tennyson neighborhood is ideal for the daily commuter as it is about half a mile away for the Nimitz freeway and a quarter mile away from Mission Blvd.
This neighborhood features quite a few restaurants such as, Cecil's Famous Burgers, Tin Fu Chinese restaurant, Moon Indian Restaurant, amongst others.
The Harder-Tennyson neighborhood is also home to a Grocery Outlet and a the locally owned Chavez Market.
Open Showings: ***We have many options for you to tour and still social distance,
live virtual tours, additional pictures or video.
Rent After 1 Month Free and Look and Lease Promotion: $1,950.00

*Please note, this unit is tenant occupied until the Available Date however we are showing a like-kind unit as well as can set up scheduled tours to prospective tenants with an application on file (refundable application fee).
or email leasing @ <URL> to set up an agent guided or self guided tour!
